text:
Is anyone noticed changing in blog 
TOPIC replace by TAG in URL ?
Thanks !
Topics have been renamed to Tags since that’s the common name and it reduces confusion with the Content Strategy tool. It should not have broken anything though
So will the urls change of all sites ?

Happy Friday folks! Has anyone done much with AMP pages in HubSpot? I’m trying to figure out what my options are for getting Google Analytics/Google Tag Manager to work with the HS AMP implementation.
i notice some weeks ago, it wasnt good news for us :disappointed:
No, all the urls will still contain “topic”
